If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Feminine, hip, and confident. That's what Cynthia Vincent wants people to think of when they see her designs for Twelfth Street. With a resume a mile long, the designer doesn't have much to worry about. Celebrities across the country have been spotted sporting Twelfth Street duds, and pieces have been featured in nearly every major fashion magazine. The designer makes sexy, comfortable clothes she wants to wear, and obviously a whole lot of other people want to as well.
